name: PHImageContentMode
desc: Options for fitting an imageâ€™s aspect ratio to a requested size, used by the requestImage(for:targetSize:contentMode:options:resultHandler:) method.

items.name: static var `default`: PHImageContentMode
items.desc: Fits the image to the requested size using the default option, PHImageContentMode.aspectFit.

items.name: case aspectFit
items.desc: Scales the image so that its larger dimension fits the target size.

items.name: case aspectFill
items.desc: Scales the image so that it completely fills the target size.
